Entries.Introduction: Well hello there! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}, chef and owner of the Stardrop Saloon.#$e#Stop in if you need any refreshments. I've always got hot coffee and cold beer at the ready.$h
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Hey. I heard what you did for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}. That was really really nice of you!$h#$e#Sadly, I don't think it will get her to cut back on the 'beverages'...
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I saw {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} earlier today... she was grinning from ear to ear! She said someone bought her a new house!#$e#Whoever it was, they truly deserve the best!$h
Entries.SeedShop_Entry: Hi, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}!/Now, what do I need.../Ah, that looks good!/Makin' my special sauce tonight!/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}! What's fresh?/{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}! Waddya got for me?
Entries.Wed: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}'s been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without her!#$e#I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself.$s
Entries.Thu: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}} come into the saloon almost every night.#$e#I'd probably go out of business if they stopped coming.$h#$e#So make sure you don't drive them away!
Entries.Thu6: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}} comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}}self.#$e#Sometimes {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} glances over at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} with a nervous look. Hmmm.#$e#Maybe that's why {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.
Entries.Thu8: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} comes into the saloon almost every night and drinks way too much beer.#$e#Ah well, I shouldn't pass judgement on my customers.

Entries.Mon.000: I'm getting some supplies for the saloon. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s got the good stuff.$h
